root.name: Madballs in... Babo: Invasion
root.description: FeaturesIngame Screenshot16 Player Multi-player- Invasion- Avatar Attack- Skirmish- Team Skirmish- Capture the flagSingle Player Campaign- 5 levels as Babo- 5 levels as Scorched21 Playable Maps10 Playable Characters- Babo- Oculus Orbus- Robo- Boba- Jenkins- Eidolon- Major Stone- Scorched- Horn Head- Magmor- Daemonak- Aescu- Pett- Grok20 Alternate Powerups20 Weapons- Babo- Beamer- Butcher- Lobber- Shotty- Stitcher- Scorched- Crackler- Riffer- Ruptor- Stormer- ZookaDownloadable ContentTwo weapons for online (80 Microsoft points)Secondary skin for Magmor (Free)3D Rendered picture pack (80 Microsoft points)Illustrated art picture pack (80 Microsoft points)Trailer (Free)LeaderboardsTeam vs. Team CombatAvatar Support800 Microsoft points ($10 US)PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP 32-bit/Vista/Windows 7Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.8 GHz or any Dual Core processorMemory: 768MB RAM (XP) / 1 GB RAM (Vista/7)Graphics: DirectX 9 level card w 64 MB VRAM – NVIDIA GeForce Series 6 or better, ATI 9600 or better, Intel Extreme Graphics 2 or betterHard Drive: 500 MB freeSound: DirectX Compatible SoundcardRecommendedOS: Windows XP 32-bit/Vista/Windows 7Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core or BetterMemory: 1GB RAM(XP) / 1.5 GB RAM (Vista/7)Graphics: DirectX 9 level card w 256 MB VRAM and Shader model 3.0 – NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, ATI X1900 or betterHard Drive: 500 MB freeSound: DirectX Compatible SoundcardMac System RequirementsOS: OS X 10.5 or laterProcessor: Intel MacMemory: 1GB RAMGraphics: Dedicated video card w/ 128MB of Video MemoryHard Drive: 500MBMisc: Mouse, Keyboard, Internet Connection
